short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for customized searching without homepage recommendations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many of us try to search something in YouTube but end up in playing videos which are recommended by the YouTube. This extension helps to bypass the YouTube home page and let's you go to the page which you need with the help of a search bar.
